chapters.title: Prologue
chapters.summary: While tracking a group of wildling raiders beyond the Wall, three rangers of the Night's Watch encounter a group of Others.

chapters.title: Bran I
chapters.summary: Lord Eddard Stark dispenses justice to a Night's Watch deserter. When they are on their way back to Winterfell, and Jon Snow and Robb Stark find six orphaned direwolf pups.

chapters.title: Catelyn I
chapters.summary: Lady Catelyn Tully seeks out her husband, Lord Eddard Stark, in the godswood of Winterfell to inform him of the news that his foster father, Lord Jon Arryn, the Hand of the King, is dead, and that King Robert I Baratheon, his family, and half his court are on their way to Winterfell.

chapters.title: Daenerys I
chapters.summary: The exiled Princess Daenerys Targaryen prepares to be presented to the Dothraki khal, Drogo, as her brother, the would-be king Viserys Targaryen, hopes to gain a Dothraki army through a marriage alliance.

present: Girl bought to please the king

chapters.title: Eddard I
chapters.summary: King Robert I Baratheon arrives with his party at Winterfell, where he offers Lord Eddard Stark the position of Hand of the King and proposes a betrothal between Eddard's daughter, Sansa and his own son, Prince Joffrey.

chapters.title: Jon I
chapters.summary: Jon Snow attends the feast Winterfell is holding for the royal guests and speaks with both Benjen Stark and Tyrion Lannister.

chapters.title: Catelyn II
chapters.summary: A secret letter from her sister leads Catelyn to convince Ned to go to King's Landing and become the Hand of the King.

chapters.title: Arya I
chapters.summary: Arya runs out on her needlework session to watch the boys practice with swords in the yard.

chapters.title: Bran II
chapters.summary: Bran is climbing the towers of Winterfell when he discovers Cersei and Jaime Lannister making love and talking about the danger his father poses. Eventually, he is discovered and Jaime shoves him out the window.

chapters.title: Tyrion I
chapters.summary: Tyrion meets up with his nephew Joffrey and insists he pay his sympathies to the Starks, before joining his brother and sister for breakfast with news that Bran Stark will probably survive.

chapters.title: Jon II
chapters.summary: Jon says his last goodbyes, first to the comatose Bran, then to Robb, and finally to Arya, to whom he gives a Braavosi-type sword.
